July 21, 1928 D Oxfordshire & District Contest (Section 3)
Oxfordshire & District Contest (Section 3) 30 Test Piece Contest Oxfordshire & District Contest oxfordshire-district-contest-section-3
None
Test Piece Contest
Recollections of Verdi
Shipton Manor, Shipton-on-Cherwell, Oxfordshire, England, UK 4 bands competed.
No Section 1 this year (cancelled due to low entry). Prizes were cascaded down a section, so the usual Section 2 prizes were given to Section 3 bands.
Oct. 7, 2013, 10:09 a.m. March 19, 2021, 4:15 p.m.
1 Chinnor Silver Band Charles Burkett Dawn of Spring
2 Bletchington Silver Band J. G. Griffith Gems of Sir Henry Bishop
3 Flackwell Heath W. J. Burnham Hiawatha [Coleridge-Taylor arr. Godfrey]
4 Hook Norton Brass Band Unknown Dawn of Spring
